The '''''Untitled Tintin Project''''' is an announced film project of three back-to-back features that are going to be based on ''[[The Adventures of Tintin]]'', a series of [[comic book]]s created by [[Belgium|Belgian]] artist Georges Remi, better known by his pen name, [[HergÃ©]]. [[Steven Spielberg]] and [[Peter Jackson]] have confirmed that they will direct two of the three films, with a third director still unannounced. [[Steven Moffat]] is writing the scripts for the three films, which will be filmed using [[motion capture]].
  +   +
==Development==
  +
Spielberg has been an avid, lifelong fan of ''The Adventures of Tintin'' comic books and wanted to adapt the author's comic book series as a motion picture for over 25 years. He and his production partner [[Kathleen Kennedy (movie producer)|Kathleen Kennedy]] of [[Amblin Entertainment]] have obtained and lost various rights throughout the years, never going beyond the development stage. Spielberg bought an option on the [[Tintin and Snowy|Tintin]] character shortly before HergÃ©'s death in 1983. In October 2007, [[Steven Moffat]] signed on to write the screenplay for the three ''Tintin'' films.<ref>{{cite news | author = Carly Mayberry | title = Scribe Moffat on 'Tintin' case | publisher = [[The Hollywood Reporter]] | date = [[2007-10-02]] | url = http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/hr/content_display/news/e3ia426500233e132c7ae7d566d04f0282e | accessdate=2007-10-02}}</ref> The story will be taken from among the twenty-three Tintin books published between [[1929]] and [[1976]].<ref name="BBC">{{cite news |first = |last = |url = http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/entertainment/6656635.stm |title = Spielberg to make Tintin movie' |publisher = [[BBC News]] |date= [[2007-05-15]] |accessdate = 2007-05-24}}</ref> Spielberg stated Jackson will direct the first film in [[New Zealand]], that he himself would direct the second in the [[United States]], and that they would co-direct the third if they could not find a director.<ref name=tintin>{{cite news | author = Heather Newgen | title = Spielberg Talks Indy 4, Transformers & Tintin! | publisher = Comingsoon.net | date = [[2007-10-10]] | url = http://www.comingsoon.net/news/movienews.php?id=38211 | accessdate=2007-10-10}}</ref>
